title: Queen of the Ravagers
description: Blackspire, the home of the Ravagers, is supposed to be a safe place for my family. Cut off from the Other Side, the monsters in the dark cannot reach us here.  But something is stirring in the hearts of the unmated. A sickness that makes them aggressive and turns their eyes black.  Driven from our only sanctuary in the galaxy, it becomes clear that the only way to save the Ravagers from the darkness is by fulfilling an age old prophecy.  A prophecy that demands a sacrificeâ€¦ Me.
author: Sara Page
